Primary Contact: Leah Thordarson, President, Westside Celebration Society; Phone: 250.999.7210; Fax: 250.768.3996; Email: Admin@westsidedaze.com
Alternate Contact: Sylvia Hermans, Vice President, Westside Daze; Phone: 250.769.7790 * 250.863.6429; Fax: 250.768.3996; Email: sylviahermans@shaw.ca
Service Details: - Organizes and promotes Westside Daze, a 3-day, free, family-safe festival includes events such as: Kid's fair, Show-and-Shine, Parade, Fireworks, and free evening concerts- Held annually on the weekend closest to Canada Day with most of the events taking place at Memorial Park- Volunteer positions are available
Hours: Please visit the website for details
How to Apply: Please call, email or visit our website for additional information or to volunteer
Cost: - FREE Festival: We do not charge for any event that the Committee hosts, with the exception of the pancake breakfast which is a fundraiser- Vendors and booths may be selling products- FREE Events include: Kids Fair & Okanagan Day, Show & Shine, Daytime entertainment and Evening concerts
Meetings: Our meeting start with the Strategic planning at the Annual General Meeting in November or December and monthly meetings commence the first Wednesday of each month January to May then we will have bi-weekly meetings until Event Date
Address & Map: 22 - 2475 Dobbin Rd, Suite 555West Kelowna, BC     V4T 2E9View MapQuest Map
Accessibility: On event day, we have handicapped parking by Johnson Bentley Pool with volunteers operating people movers to assist anyone with walking challenges
Elections: Held each year at the Annual General Meeting in Nov/Dec
Print Material: Westside Daze official Brochure/Program, Newspaper articles, Flyers, Rack Cards, Posters
